name: Draper Fisher Jurvetson (DFJ)
tag_list: venture-capital, vc, dfj, draper-fisher-jurvetson, funding, firm, seed, early, venture, growth, enterprise, internet, healthcare, energy, mobile, technology, software
overview: DFJ is a venture capital firm that was founded in 1985. DFJ has backed more than 400 companies in enterprise, software, mobile, cleantech, energy, health care and other disruptive categories. DFJ’s team operates across the globe and specializes in many industries and geographies. DFJ works with companies in seed, early and growth stages.
